      • awardExperience

        public static void awardExperience(BmPlayer player,
                   int xp)
        Give the player some experience (possibly negative) and ensure player's level and client XP bar is correctly updated too.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to grant XP to
        xp - The amount of XP to grant

      • experienceNeeded

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getRealLevel

        public static int getRealLevel(BmPlayer player)
        Return the level that the given player should be. (Note: the player's current level might not be this, because Minecraft's experience system is just plain bizarre).
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check for
        Returns:
        The level the player should be

      • getRealLevel

        public static int getRealLevel(int exp)
        Return the level for the given amount of experience.
        Parameters:
        exp - The experience amount
        Returns:
        The level for the experience amount
